website_summaries.verdict: Unlike most shakers, this one emulsifies dressing ingredients, thanks to its surgical-grade stainless steel blender ball.
pros: Add ingredients, add BlenderBall, and shake
BlenderBall is powerful enough to keep oil and vinegar mixed for up to an hour
Ball can safely stay in dressing while storing
cons: Dishwasher safe, but complicated to clean
Reports of bottle bottom breaking appears to be from an earlier, glass model

Also note, sometimes homemade dressing tends to settle but with this whisker ball, just a few shakes and dressing is good again. I plan on getting another one for our Italian style dressing too. I definitely recommend this.

product_meta.title: Whiskware Dressing Shaker with BlenderBall Wire Whisk, Tritan - , White
product_meta.description:
Style:TritanWhip up creamy dressings, flavorful vinaigrette's, and savory marinades with the Whiskware Salad Dressing Shaker with BlenderBall Wire Whisk. Simply add ingredients, toss in the BlenderBall, and shake. Inspired by the tried and true design of the wire whisk, the BlenderBall mixer emulsifies ingredients in seconds, and keeps oil and vinegar mixed for up to an hour. The sleek, table-ready carafe features a spill-resistant spout, easy one-handed operation with the press of a finger, and printed markings (in cups and milliliters) for easy measuring. And because the award-winning BlenderBall wire whisk is made out of surgical-grade stainless steel, it can be left inside the bottle when storing the dressing for a later day. Store-bought dressings are not only expensive, they're laden with calories, additives, and preservatives. Peace of mind comes from knowing exactly what ingredients go into a meal. The 2.5-Cup (591ml) Whiskware Salad Dressing Shaker with BlenderBall Wire Whisk is available in either Eastman Tritan plastic or soda-lime glass; both are stain-resistant and BPA-free. Disassembles easily for cleaning; dishwasher safe.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 




BlenderBall Mixes as You Shake Simply add your ingredients, toss in the BlenderBall, and shake. The BlenderBall is powerful enough to emulsify the ingredients, keeping oil and vinegar mixed for up to an hour. Safely leave the surgical-grade stainless steel BlenderBall in the dressing while storing for use on a later day

Your Ingredients, Your Health Store-bought dressings are not only expensive, they're laden with extra calories, additives and preservatives. If you can't pronounce it, it doesn't belong in your food. Peace of mind comes from knowing exactly what goes into your meal




Auto-Closing Spout The unique auto-closing spout seals the second the lever is released, virtually eliminating spills

Simple, One-Handed Operation Easily open and close the spout by pressing/releasing the back part of the lid

Stain Resistant and BPA Free Available in glass or Eastman Tritan plastic, the dressing shaker is stain resistant and BPA free




Looking for a Little Inspiration? There’s something surprisingly satisfying about creating your very own salad dressing or marinade. Whether you’re craving a simple balsamic vinaigrette or looking to try a bold take on a classic ranch, the free Whiskware Recipe app provides instant access to an ever-growing selection of tried-and-true favorites. Download the app today for iOS and Android devices.




About the Startup Describe your product in 3 words.

Simple, Beautiful, Powerful

How did you come up with the idea for this product?

While there are dozens of dressing shakers on the market, none did a great job of mixing and emulsifying the ingredients. Most simply stirred the ingredients. We knew there had to be a better way.

What makes your product special?

The Whiskware dressing shaker is the only dressing shaker with the BlenderBall wire whisk. Its patented mixing system, sleek design, and ease of use set it apart from the rest.

What has been the best part of your startup experience?

Whiskware by BlenderBottle is about challenging conventional methods of cooking to find a better way. We’ve tested hundreds of products, methods, and dishes, and are excited to share our innovations
